description: Antonio Miracle is a big, beefy, and tattooed muscle bear that has a lot of passion to give his partners. He also looks incredible wearing a simple black t-shirt and jeans. Fresh-faced Derek Allan has a particular attraction to Antonio for all of these reasons and more -- he couldn’t stop staring at the beefcake on set -- so they were paired up to see what kind of fun would happen. It’s no surprise that quite a bit occurred. You might assume that Antonio would pound Derek, but he actually takes it as much as he gives. Show him who is in charge, Derek!
title: Antonio Miracle Tops And Bottoms For Derek Allan
